LanguageData.GAB_StartInsertionBaijuMashDesc: Bring baijiu mash to the baijiu pot to start fermentation process
LanguageData.GAB_CancelBringingBaijuMashDesc: Cancel bringing baijiu mash to the baijiu pot.
LanguageData.GAB_RemoveBaijuDesc: Remove baijiu from the baijiu pot. The baijiu will be acquired at the present quality level ({0})
LanguageData.GAB_StartInsertionRaksiMashDesc: Bring raksi mash to the raksi still to start fermentation process
LanguageData.GAB_CancelBringingRaksiMashDesc: Cancel bringing raksi mash to the raksi still.
LanguageData.GAB_RaksiFailurePowerWarning: The raksi is spoiling fast due to a power failure in the raksi still
LanguageData.GAB_RaksiFailurePower: The raksi has spoiled due to a power failure in the raksi still
LanguageData.GAB_KvassCurrentlyFrozen: This unfermented kvass is frozen and will not mature into kvass
LanguageData.GAB_KvassCurrentlyRefrigerated: This unfermented kvass is refrigerated and will not mature into kvass as fast as it could (matures in {0})
LanguageData.GAB_KvassMaturingCorrectly: This unfermented kvass is maturing into kvass correctly (matures in {0})
LanguageData.GAB_StartInsertionVinegarMustDesc: Bring vinegar must to the vinegar barrel to start fermentation process
LanguageData.GAB_CancelBringingVinegarMustDesc: Cancel bringing vinegar must to the vinegar barrel.
LanguageData.GAB_StartInsertionHopsDesc: Bring hops or ethanol to the brewing vat to start fermentation process
LanguageData.GAB_CancelBringingHopsDesc: Cancel bringing hops or ethanol to the brewing vat.
LanguageData.GAB_LagerFailurePowerWarning: The lager is spoiling fast due to a power failure in the brewing vat
LanguageData.GAB_LagerFailurePower: The lager has spoiled due to a power failure in the brewing vat
